snippet.title: Counter Agents Steam Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Counter Agents is a spy-themed, head-to-head multiplayer game where your objective is to sneak around guards, steal a briefcase, and make it to an exit point before your opponent. Take on the solo-player challenges, compete with your friends in multiplayer mode, and enjoy creating your own maps with the brilliantly simple level editor!

Now that we have been Greenlit, our planned release on Steam is December 1, 2016. It will be a free download, so everyone can enjoy it!

More information here: 
http://jamesgamesproductions.com/project/counter-agents-2/

Follow our Facebook Community here:
https://www.facebook.com/counteragentsgame/
